Text.Page:
I find myself in need of a unique item—fragments of Killian's shackles.

In trade I'm willing to offer something of equal value and rarity. Do we have a deal?

Well, do we have a deal?"You're giving me what, exactly?"
A fragment of Kelsaik's beak! Good trade, right? Of course it is. I'm known for good trades. So can we do business now?

Ah, yes! That’s it! Excellent!

Come and see me any time! Happy to do business with you!

And here is the beak fragment I promised. Good work, !
Do you have the fragments? Because if you don't, we're done talking.
